N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.6 - Use of two-way radios

State Regulations

No one may use a two-way radio installed on a school bus
under section
375
(21-a)
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law unless
the school district, contractor, or nonpublic school has obtained a license
from the Federal Communications Commission. Utilization of such radio is
confined to the use stipulated in the license. School bus shall mean those
vehicles defined as school buses by section
142
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
